[[File:DeepSeaScale.png|thumb|200px|The Deep Sea Scale]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Deep Sea Scale costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Pacifidlog Town]] in [[Hoenn]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | Clamperl || | Gorebyss |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
